title: Qom Salt Dome
content: Qom salt dome is located in the Dochah region in the north-west of Qom city. The characteristic of this dome is its lack of rock cover and opens alt ore deposits. The basic section of this dome is round, and its form as more or less homogeneous; its nearness to cities of Qom and Tehran and easy access to this dome is among the other geotourist characteristics of this dome.
